description: These sad dongers started crying your standard sort of vertical, falling straight down kind of tears. There is usually only a single tear that is dropping from of the sad emoticon’s eyes. These are good emoticons to use if you want to express a sadness that is not too powerful or dramatic, but is still sad enough to call upon some tears. Characters like ; or ˘̩ are good choices for this style of sad textface. title: Vertical Tears
